verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> and י֬וֹנַת <WH3123> dove אֵ֣לֶם <WH482> congregation רְ֭חֹקִים <WH7350> far abroad לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <WH4387> Michtam בֶּֽאֱחֹ֨ז <WH270> took אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> פְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <WH6430> when the Philistines בְּגַֽת׃ <WH1661> him in Gath חָנֵּ֣נִי <WH2603> Be merciful אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> unto me O God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁאָפַ֣נִי <WH7602> would swallow me up אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH582> for man כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> daily לֹחֵ֥ם <WH3898> he fighting יִלְחָצֵֽנִי׃ <WH3905> oppresseth

שָׁאֲפ֣וּ <WH7602> swallow שׁ֭וֹרְרַי <WH8324> Mine enemies כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> would daily כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבִּ֨ים <WH7227> [me] up for [they be] many לֹחֲמִ֖ים <WH3898> that fight לִ֣י מָרֽוֹם׃ <WH4791> against me O thou most High
י֥וֹם <WH3117> What time אִירָ֑א <WH3372> I am afraid אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> I אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> about אֶבְטָֽח׃ <WH982> I will trust

בֵּאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> In God אֲהַלֵּ֪ל <WH1984> I will praise דְּבָ֫ר֥וֹ <WH1697> his word בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> in God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <WH982> I have put my trust לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אִירָ֑א <WH3372> I will not fear מַה־ <WH4100> What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> can do בָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> what flesh לִֽי׃

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> Every day דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> my words יְעַצֵּ֑בוּ <WH6087> they wrest עָלַ֖י <WH5921> are against כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֣ם <WH4284> all their thoughts לָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> [are] against me for evil

יָג֤וּרוּ ׀ <WH1481> They gather themselves together [יַצְפִּינוּ כ] (יִצְפֹּ֗ונוּ <WH6845> reserve ק) הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> like עֲקֵבַ֣י <WH6119> my steps יִשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <WH8104> themselves they mark כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <WH834> as they קִוּ֥וּ <WH6960> when they wait נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> for my soul
עַל־ <WH5921> Because אָ֥וֶן <WH205> of wickedness פַּלֶּט־ <WH6405> Shall they escape לָ֑מוֹ בְּ֝אַ֗ף <WH639> anger עַמִּ֤ים ׀ <WH5971> the people הוֹרֵ֬ד <WH3381> cast down אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> O God

נֹדִי֮ <WH5112> my wanderings סָפַ֪רְתָּ֫ה <WH5608> Thou tellest אָ֥תָּה <WH859> you שִׂ֣ימָה <WH7760> put דִמְעָתִ֣י <WH1832> thou my tears בְנֹאדֶ֑ךָ <WH4997> into thy bottle הֲ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> not בְּסִפְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5612> bill

אָ֥֨ז <WH227> Then יָ֘שׁ֤וּבוּ <WH7725> turn אוֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> [unto thee] then shall mine enemies אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> back בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> When אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> I cry זֶה־ <WH2088> This יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> this I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> for God לִֽי׃
בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> In God אֲהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> will I praise דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> [his] word בַּ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> in the LORD אֲהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> will I praise דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> [his] word

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> In God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <WH982> have I put my trust לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אִירָ֑א <WH3372> I will not be afraid מַה־ <WH4100> What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> can do אָדָ֣ם <WH120> what man לִֽי׃
עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> [are] upon me O God נְדָרֶ֑יךָ <WH5088> Thy vows אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> I will render תּוֹדֹ֣ת <WH8426> praises לָֽךְ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הִצַּ֪לְתָּ <WH5337> For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֡י <WH5315> my soul מִמָּוֶת֮ <WH4194> from death הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> Indeed רַגְלַ֗י <WH7272> [wilt] not [thou deliver] my feet מִ֫דֶּ֥חִי <WH1762> from falling לְ֭הִֽתְהַלֵּךְ <WH1980> that I may walk לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God בְּ֝א֗וֹר <WH216> in the light הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living
